author: Mauro Mahjoub
description: A nutty riff on a Negroni with a lingering bittersweet hazelnut finish. The dark (high cocoa content) chocolate and orange slice garnish brilliantly befits this cocktail.
name: Munich Negroni Western Style
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
